\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
% \usetikzlibrary{positioning} % for relative note placement (right = of)

\tikzset{%
  node distance=0cm   % 0 distance between nodes so that edges coincide
}

% Style of "tarjeta" node
\tikzstyle{tarjeta}=[%
    , draw                 % draw rectangle edges     
    , text width = 1.2in     % min width     
    , minimum height = 1.7in % min height
    , align = center       % alignment
    , outer sep = 0cm      % 0 "personal space" for nodes
    , inner sep = 2ex      % 0 "personal space" for nodes
    , execute at begin node={\centering\let\raggedright\relax} % Prevent hyphenation and center
    % , text height=0.5cm    % vertical placement of text inside node
    % , text depth=0.0cm,    % vertical placement of text inside node (modes opposite dir)
]


\def\textoTarjetaA{$78\div 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaB{$84\div 7$}
\def\textoTarjetaC{$68\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaD{$65\div 5$}
\def\textoTarjetaE{$90\div 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaF{$45\div 15$}
\def\textoTarjetaG{$57\div 19$}
\def\textoTarjetaH{$72\div 18$}
\def\textoTarjetaI{$52\div 13$}
\def\textoTarjetaJ{$84\div 12$}
\def\textoTarjetaK{$42\div 7$}
\def\textoTarjetaL{$56\div 8$}
\def\textoTarjetaM{$72\div 9$}
\def\textoTarjetaN{$64\div 8$}
\def\textoTarjetaO{$81\div 9$}
\def\textoTarjetaP{$72\div 3$}
\def\textoTarjetaQ{$92\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaR{$69\div 3$}
\def\textoTarjetaS{$84\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaT{$63\div 3$}


\node[tarjeta] (tarjetaA) {\textoTarjetaA};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaB) {\textoTarjetaB};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaB] (tarjetaC) {\textoTarjetaC};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaC] (tarjetaD) {\textoTarjetaD};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaE) {\textoTarjetaE};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaE] (tarjetaF) {\textoTarjetaF};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaF] (tarjetaG) {\textoTarjetaG};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaG] (tarjetaH) {\textoTarjetaH};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaE] (tarjetaI) {\textoTarjetaI};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaI] (tarjetaJ) {\textoTarjetaJ};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaJ] (tarjetaK) {\textoTarjetaK};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaK] (tarjetaL) {\textoTarjetaL};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaI] (tarjetaM) {\textoTarjetaM};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaM] (tarjetaN) {\textoTarjetaN};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaN] (tarjetaO) {\textoTarjetaO};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaO] (tarjetaP) {\textoTarjetaP};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaM] (tarjetaQ) {\textoTarjetaQ};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaQ] (tarjetaR) {\textoTarjetaR};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaR] (tarjetaS) {\textoTarjetaS};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaS] (tarjetaT) {\textoTarjetaT};


\foreach \tarj in {A,...,T}{
  \node[below right, font=\scriptsize, align=left] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west){Compara: Divide hasta 100};
  % \node[below right] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west) {\tarj};
}


\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
